name: Magic Ali
description:
Ali is a little girl who's magical abilities suddenly awoke.

She's trapped in a forest full of creatures who want to devour her power, help her scape!

This is a concept I had been thinking about developing for a while, I put together this little prototype in about 2 weeks working in my free time.
Magic Ali is the first personal project I work on, although I had previously work on some games for school porjects.

I really hope you like this little thing, and if you don't, thank you for giving me a cople of seconds of your time, if you have any comments or suggestions, be free to leave them below.

I'll continue to work on this and other games in the future, so if you liked this, follow me to see what I do next.

Thank you for reading and playing!

- Angel Escamilla
